author: Zachary Basu, Orion Rummler
title: White House issues new guidance urging face coverings in public to stop spread of coronavirus
description: The White House announced that the CDC is recommending Americans wear cloth masks or face coverings in public to help stop the spread of the coronavirus, President Trump said at a press briefing on Friday — emphasizing the guidance is "voluntary." Why it matt…
content:
The White House announced that the CDC is recommending Americans wear cloth masks or face coverings in public to help stop the spread of the coronavirus, President Trump said at a press briefing on Friday emphasizing the guidance is "voluntary."
